issue.title: [C++][Dataset] Ensure virtual columns are not materialized on write
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10437](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10437). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
If a column is virtual on read and will remain virtual after writing then materializing and grouping on it is a pure waste. Maybe Partitioning::Partition should take a "already known" partition expression and only group on columns not in it?
